articles.description: From Harshad Chopda and Pranali Rathod to Anupamaa actors, Oscar winner Guneet Monga and more joined Anupamaa fame Rupali Ganguly's birthday bash held in the city last night.
articles.content: Rupali Ganguly, popularly known as Anupamaa celebrated her 46th birthday on 5th April 2023. The actress owing to her hectic schedule did not throw a birthday bash right away. Last night, the actress … [+224 chars]
